Questions: 1. What was the name of Jesus' mother?
2. What was the name of the garden where Adam and Eve lived?
3. With what food did Jesus feed 5000 people?
4. What method did the Romans use to kill Jesus?
5. From which part of Adam's body did God create Eve?
7. Which creature tricked Eve into eating of the forbidden fruit?
8. At Christ's crucifixion what did the soldiers place on his head?
10. What relationship was Ruth to Naomi?
11. Who lied to God when he was asked where his brother was?
12. Who showed his faith by being willing to offer his son on an altar to God?
14. What was inscribed above Jesus' cross?
ANSWERS: 14. This is Jesus King of the Jews (Matt 27:27)

Questions: 15. Whose mother placed him in an ark of bulrushes?
16. For how many days and nights did it rain in the story of the flood?
17. What was special about Jesus' mother?
18. Who gave gifts to Jesus when he was a young child?
19. What happened to Jonah after he was thrown overboard?
ANSWERS: 19. He was swallowed by a great fish (Jon 1:17)

Questions: 20. In whose image was man created?
21. How many apostles did Jesus choose?
22. What are the wages of sin?
24. Who else other than the wise men came to visit Jesus when he was a small child?
25. Who lied when he was asked to reveal the source of his great strength?
26. What was the name of the man Jesus' mother was engaged to at the time she became pregnant?
28. From what disaster did the Ark save Noah?
29. What happened to Jesus forty days after his resurrection?
30. What animals did Jesus cause to run into the sea and drown?
31. On what were the Ten Commandments written?
32. What did Jesus sleep in after he was born?
33. What was man created from?
34. What did Jesus do to each of the disciples during the Last Supper?
35. To which city did God ask Jonah to take his message?
36. Who was David's father?
38. What is the only sin that cannot be forgiven?
39. How did David defeat Goliath?
ANSWERS: 39. He hit him with a stone from his sling (1 Sam 17:49)

Questions: 40. What did Joseph's brothers do to get rid of him?
ANSWERS: 40. Threw him in a pit and then sold him to strangers (Gen 37:28)

Questions: 41. Who wrote the letter to Philemon?
42. In what was Jesus wrapped before he was buried?
43. What was the name of Moses' brother?
44. What sin is Cain remembered for?
48. What was David's occupation before he became king?

52. From which country did Moses help the Israelites escape from their lives of slavery?
53. Who was the fourth person in the fiery furnace along with Daniel's friends?
54. What did Joseph's brothers do to deceive their father to cover up that they had sold Joseph into slavery?
ANSWERS: 54. Dipped his coat in the blood of a goat (Gen 37:31)

Questions: 55. What kind of leaves did Adam and Eve sew together to make clothes for themselves?
56. Who did Jesus say was the "father of lies"?
57. What was the name of the tower that the people were building when God confused their language?
59. Whose name means "father of a great multitude"?
61. Which sea did the Israelites cross through to escape the Egyptians?
62. What is "more dif cult than a camel going through the eye of a needle"?
ANSWERS: 62. A rich man entering the Kingdom of God (Matt 19:24)

Questions: 63. For how many years did the Israelites wander in the wilderness?

65. Which small body part can "boast of great things"?

67. What did God do on the seventh day after he had finished creating everything?
68. On what day did the apostles receive the Holy Spirit?

73. On which mountain were the Israelites given the Ten Commandments?
74. Who was Solomon's father?
75. What job did Jesus' earthly father Joseph do?
76. How did Judas betray Christ?
77. Solomon judged wisely over the rightful mother of a child but how did he determine who the child belonged to?
ANSWERS: 77. Threatened to divide the child (with a sword) (1 Ki 3:25)

Questions: 78. Whose father was prepared to sacrifice him on an altar?
79. At the age of twelve Jesus was left behind in Jerusalem. Where did his parents find him?
80. When the disciples saw Jesus walking on water what did they think he was?

Questions: 83. Which musical instrument did David play for Saul?

88. Which of Christ's belongings did the soldiers cast lots for after they had crucified him?
89. What does the name Emmanuel mean?

Questions: 91. Where did Jesus meet the woman of Samaria?

Questions: 113. Which well known Psalm of David contains the line "he maketh me to lie down in green pastures"?

116. Who was Jacob's grandfather?

Questions: 120. To which tribe did Jesus belong?

Questions: 122. What affliction did Hannah suffer from that allowed Peninnah to provoke her?

Questions: 132. As Esau grew what was he was described as?

Questions: 134. What was Bathsheba doing when David first saw her?

148. How long will the Kingdom of God last?

156. What was Jesus teaching about when he said "What therefore God hath joined together let not man put asunder"?

159. Five of the Ten Virgins did not take enough of what?
160. What was the name of Joseph's master in Egypt?
161. Aaron turned his rod into a serpent before Pharaoh and Pharaoh's magicians did likewise but what happened to their serpents?
162. To which country did Mary and Joseph escape when Herod killed all the babies in Bethlehem?
163. What is the name of the angel who appeared to Mary?
164. Which land did the Lord promise to Abram?

ANSWERS: 165. The Kingdom of God and his righteousness (Matt 6:33)

Questions: 167. In the parable of the ten virgins what were they waiting for?
168. What event occurred to help release Paul and Silas from prison?
169. Which prisoner did the crowd call for to be released when Pilate asked them?

Questions: 172. When Jesus asked "whom say ye that I am?" what did Peter reply?

Questions: 174. What will happen to the people who do not accept the kingdom of God like a child?
175. How did the angel of the Lord appear to Moses when he was a shepherd?

178. Which of his wives did Jacob love the most?

Questions: 181. Where is the "best place to pray"?
ANSWERS: 181. In your closet with the door shut (Matt 6:6)

Questions: 182. What does James say happens if we "draw nigh to God"?

Questions: 183. Where was Jesus baptized?

Questions: 189. To whom was the Revelation of Jesus Christ given?

Questions: 200. At what age did Jesus start his ministry?
201. What animal spoke to Balaam?
203. What happened to Daniel after he gave thanks to God by his open window?

Questions: 204. What was Jonah's reaction to the way the people of the city of Nineveh responded to God's message?
205. Zacharias and Elizabeth were told by an angel that they would have a son. What was he to be called?

Questions: 208. In his Sermon on the Mount what does Jesus say about tomorrow?

ANSWERS: 209. His grain money and a silver cup (Gen 44:2)

Questions: 210. What did Paul do to the soothsayer?

Questions: 211. What was the name of the place where Jesus Christ was crucified?

213. What are the names of Joseph's parents?

215. What was the name of Ruth's second husband?
218. Which prophet anointed David as king?

ANSWERS: 221. We have one father who is in heaven (Matt 23:9)

Questions: 222. What kind of water does Jesus discuss with the Samaritan woman at the well?

Questions: 224. Where did Jesus find Zacchaeus the tax collector?

Questions: 232. What type of coin did Judas accept as payment for betraying Jesus?

ANSWERS: 233. To receive his slave back as a brother in Christ (Phm 1:17)

Questions: 236. To what object does James compare the tongue?

Questions: 247. What was Solomon famous for building?

Questions: 307. What does faith require to make it a living faith?

Questions: 328. Who came to see Jesus by night?

Questions: 343. Who said to Mary "Blessed are you among women and blessed is the fruit of your womb!"?

Questions: 350. After the first king of Israel failed God what was the name of the second man who was anointed king?

Questions: 387. How did Moses command the Red Sea to divide so the Israelites could cross over?

ANSWERS: 839. To keep them separate as they were shepherds which were an abomination to the Egyptians (Gen 46:34)

Questions: 840. After the exile the Israelites returned and started to rebuild the temple in Jerusalem but which other prophet along with Zechariah was sent to encourage the completion of the partly built temple?

ANSWERS: 844. By the fruit of his mouth (Pro 18:20)
